wikipedia_page.main: Vincent "Vince" Gribbin (first ¼ 1965) is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Hensingham ARLFC (in Hensingham, Whitehaven), Whitehaven (two spells), and Salford, as a centre, i.e. number 3 or 4.
